mapper.select: select T_NO as no, T_NAME as name, T_CODE as code, T_PRECODE as preCode from T_SITEMAP
select T_NO as no, T_NAME as name, T_CODE as code, T_PRECODE as preCode from T_SITEMAP where T_CODE = #{string}
select T_NO as no, T_NAME as name, T_CODE as code, T_PRECODE as preCode from T_SITEMAP where T_PRECODE is null
select T_NO as no, T_NAME as name, T_CODE as code, T_PRECODE as preCode from T_SITEMAP where T_PRECODE is not null and T_PRECODE = #{preCode}
